text: [Ej mu'minon] Agar ʙa sumo neki [va xusi] rasad, ononro anduhgin mesozad va agar ʙa sumo ʙadi [va gazande] rasad, ʙad-on sodmon mesavand; va agar [ʙar taqdiri ilohi] saʙru parhezgori namoed, makru najrangason hec zijone ʙa sumo namerasonad, [caro ki] ʙe tardid, Alloh taolo ʙa on ci mekunand, ihota dorad
